messages.body:
Hello,

I received a notification that my account has been locked due to suspicious activity, but I haven't done anything unusual. I use this account for my business and need to access it urgently to process customer orders.

Can you help me understand what triggered this and how I can get my account restored?

Best regards,
Thomas

Hi,

Thanks for the quick response. My verification code is 847591. I was traveling for business yesterday and accessed my account from the airport and hotel, which might explain the unusual locations. I haven't noticed any unauthorized activity on my account.

I've already updated my password through the recovery link, but I still can't log in. Can you please help?

Best regards,
Thomas

Hi Thomas,

Thank you for providing the verification code and explaining your recent travel. I've reviewed your account activity and can confirm that the login attempts match your travel timeline. This was indeed what triggered our security system.

I've removed the lock from your account and added a note about your travel pattern. To prevent this from happening again, I recommend:

1. Using our mobile app which has better travel detection
2. Adding your common travel locations to your trusted locations list
3. Keeping your two-factor authentication enabled

You should be able to log in now. Please try accessing your account and let me know if you have any issues.

We apologize for any inconvenience this caused to your business operations.

Best regards,
Michael

Hi Michael,

Perfect, I'm back in my account now! Thanks for the quick resolution and the helpful tips about the mobile app and trusted locations - I'll definitely set those up to avoid future issues.

I appreciate your thorough explanation and swift action. Have a great day!

Best regards,
Thomas
